main.name: Floriana Ciaglia
main.description: I am a newly graduated software engineer soon to start a new advanture at Hewlett Packard Enterprise in beautiful Boise, Idaho.
main.bio: I spend my working days creating cool things on my computer and my free time outside creating vitamin D.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science with Minor in Applied Mathematics

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
work.description: Lead the implementation and paper writing of the Roboflow 100 (RF100) research proeject. RF100 focused on the creation of a new computer vision benchmark for narrow domain models.

work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Member of the ADaPT data flow optimization lab for research in high performance computing, compiler optimization research and performance bench-marking.

work.company: National Center for Atmospheric Research - NCAR
work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Refactored configuration related code in the ASPEN (Atmospheric Sounding Processing Environment) program with the goal of eliminating technical debt.

projects.title: The Expense Tracker
projects.category: A Swift mobile application that tracks your spending habits
